channel.title: CVE Feed for NetApp -- NetApp FAS 8300/8700 and AFF A400 Baseboard Management Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NetApp -- NetApp FAS 8300/8700 and AFF A400 Baseboard Management Controller

item.title: CVE-2019-17274|2024-08-05T01:33:17.371Z -- netapp -- netapp%20fas%208300%2F8700%20and%20aff%20a400%20baseboard%20management%20controller
item.description: NetApp FAS 8300/8700 and AFF A400 Baseboard Management Controller (BMC) firmware versions 13.x prior to 13.1P1 were shipped with a default account enabled that could allow unauthorized arbitrary command execution via local access.
